name: Iridescence (Jacob Albano)
description:
A puzzle game about discovery.

Iridescence is a game about working through problems by approaching them from a direction that might be less than obvious, where the first systems you're introduced to might still surprise you halfway through, and where the joy of having a solution "click" in your mind is the paramount goal.

  • Exploratory play and an intuitive, text-free tutorial that seamlessly introduces new mechanics without breaking the flow of the game.
  • 50 mind-bending puzzles, plus the Ogmo editor project used to create the original levels and full support for mods.
  • Original ambient/electronic soundtrackby Chris Logsdon.

Iridescence is out for Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android.
All downloads are DRM-free.
